divs: sighting detailsvideo taken october 4th 2010 and posted on youtube here: *link moved to additional evidence section below--cms\sg. on september 29th at 1am montreal suburb cote saint luc residents reported seeing a ufo hovering over the cavendish mall. on october 2nd at around 9:30 pm i was putting my son to bed and felt compelled to look out my bedroom window. right away i noticed an abnormally bright "star" that i had never seen there before to my knowledge. it hung in the sky at what looked like double the altitude the planes were flying at. i live close to dorval airport and there is an aerial landing path on either side of my house. plenty of planes fly by constantly. the star-like object captivated my attention. my son got out of bed and we both spent a good forty minutes watching it move across the sky slowly in a southern direction and an upward trajectory. it was moving slowly away from us. the strangest thing it did was it moved in reaction to a plane that was flying somewhat close to it, it moved up and away, also south really quickly compared to its other movement. otherwise it's movements seemed to be hovering and gliding over. i noted its position in the sky before i went to sleep at midnight. on october 3rd the same object became visible as i was walking my dog with my son at 7:30pm. in an effort to distinguish this light from the stars, i actually noticed another similar strange light object. i pointed to what i assumed was a bright star, (had we been inside i would have only seen this from the front balcony) and said ���see there that sky. that 2nd light moved across the sky rather quickly, i kept checking on it and it moved in a northeastern direction but maintained a very high altitude. again i noted its position in the sky before i went to sleep at midnight. on october 4th i was ready to video the object, worried it wouldn���t come back or not be visible because of the cloudy weather conditions but sure enough at 8:30 Summary: Video of Intense Bright UFO Light Orb hovering and moving across Montreal Sky on evenings of Oct 2, 3 and 4th 2010 visible all night, near Dorval airport.
